title: Bajaj Auto aims to make 10,000 Triumph units a month by September, CFO says
description: Bajaj Auto targets 10,000 units monthly for Triumph motorcycles by September, with a robust financial performance driven by rural India's demand for entry-level models and steady mid-level motorcycle sales.
